amendatorysection.catchline: Special permit for sale at other than established place of business; issuance.
amendatorysection.para: Notwithstanding the other provisions of the Motor Vehicle Industry Regulation Act restricting sales to an established place of business, any motor vehicle, motorcycle, or trailer dealer licensed in accordance with the act may be granted a special permit to display and sell passenger cars, motor vehicles, motorcycles, trailers, or self-propelled motor homes at fairs, sports shows, vacation shows, and similar events, subject to the conditions established by sections 60-1407.02 to 60-1407.04.
